MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-DEC-2020 13:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes affecting properties in Church Street, Dock Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:52am. Our engineers are on site and are currently working on a fault located on our underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:43am on the 3rd December 2020.
